General.Name: Nable Communications Inc
General.Description: Nable Communications, Inc. provides communication solutions in the fields of wired/wireless convergence infrastructure, client, and All-IP communication security markets. The company offers IP based communications solutions, IP telephony solutions, IMS enabler application servers, and IMS client solutions. It provides IoT, UC, video surveillance, and RCS products. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea. Nable Communications, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Korea Vehicle & Ind. Co., Ltd.
